# Save Variables
<!--
@name: Save Variables
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

save the content of variables or arrays into a file
## Parameters

- **path&dollar;**: Path of the file to save
- **any**: A list of variables to be saved, saparated by commas
---
